归档页面

2021-01-01

使用template/tag.html渲染数据，可自行定义展示样式

数据

  1. 站点设置

    • 站点信息，map 类型

        {{.Site}}

    • 站点名称，string 类型

        {{.Site.Name}}

    • 站点域名，string 类型

        {{.Site.Origin}}

  2. 主题设置

    • 主题信息，map 类型

        {{.Theme}}

    • 版权信息，string 类型

        {{.Theme.copyright}}

    • 统计信息，string 类型

        {{.Theme.analysis}}

  3. 列表信息

    • 标签列表，array 类型

        {{.Catalog}}

      • 详情信息，map 类型

          {{.Message}}

      • Meta 信息，map 类型

          {{.Message.Meta}}

举例

  • tag.html

     1  {{define "tag"}}
 2
 3  <!DOCTYPE html>
 4  <html lang="en">
 5      <head>
 6          <meta charset="UTF-8" />
 7          <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
 8          <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
 9          <title>{{.Theme.tdk.tag.title}} of {{slug .Path}} - {{.Site.Name}}</title>
10          <meta name="description" content="{{.Theme.tdk.tag.description}}" />
11          <link rel="stylesheet" href="/assets/css/output.css" />
12      </head>
13
14      <body class="bg-gray-100">
15          <!-- header -->
16          {{template "header" .}} 
17
18          <!-- main -->
19          <main>
20              {{ range .Catalog}}
21              <div class="w-11/12 max-w-screen-xl mx-auto my-3 px-5 py-5 rounded-md bg-white">
22                  <h2 class="text-xl md:text-2xl">
23                      <a href="{{toLower .Name}}"> {{.Meta.title}} </a>
24                  </h2>
25                  <p class="py-3 leading-loose text-gray-600">{{.Meta.description}}</p>
26                  <div class="flex flex-row justify-between md:justify-start">
27                      <p class="text-gray-600 flex flex-row justify-center md:justify-start items-center">
28                          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
29                              <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 20l4-16m2 16l4-16M6 9h14M4 15h14" />
30                          </svg>
31                          <span class="mx-2 text-sm">
32                              {{if .Lang.State}}
33                              <a href="/{{.Lang.Content}}/category/{{toLower .Meta.category}}/"> {{.Meta.category}} </a>
34                              {{else}}
35                              <a href="/category/{{toLower .Meta.category}}/"> {{.Meta.category}} </a>
36                              {{ end }}
37                          </span>
38                      </p>
39                      <p class="py-3 text-gray-600 flex flex-row justify-center md:justify-start items-center">
40                          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-4 w-4" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
41                              <path
42                                  stroke-linecap="round"
43                                  stroke-linejoin="round"
44                                  stroke-width="2"
45                                  d="M8 7V3m8 4V3m-9 8h10M5 21h14a2 2 0 002-2V7a2 2 0 00-2-2H5a2 2 0 00-2 2v12a2 2 0 002 2z"
46                              />
47                          </svg>
48                          <span class="mx-2 text-sm"> {{.Meta.date}}</span>
49                      </p>
50                  </div>
51              </div>
52              {{end}}
53          </main>
54
55          <!-- footer -->
56          {{template "footer" .}}
57      </body>
58  </html>
59  {{end}}
